Enhance Your Amazon Campaigns With PAS and  AD Badger



You are here: Home1 / About Us2 / Ad Badger Partner

What is the Amazon Campaigns and ad badger
At PAS, we are dedicated to providing our clients with the best tools and resources to maximize their success on Amazon. By partnering with us, you gain exclusive access to Ad Badger, an AI-driven software designed to optimize and simplify your Amazon PPC campaigns.

Key Features and Benefits of Ad Badger with PAS


Effortless PPC Management

Simplified Campaign Management: Ad Badger’s intuitive platform makes it easy to manage your Amazon PPC campaigns, saving you time and effort.
Quick-to-Master Course: Gain access to a comprehensive Amazon PPC course that helps you quickly master effective PPC management.

Optimize AD Spend

Reclaim Wasted Ad Spend: Ad Badger hunts for and removes unprofitable search terms nightly, ensuring your budget is spent effectively.
Increase Sales and Revenue: Targeted and efficient campaigns driven by smart automation help you boost sales and revenue.

Smart Automation

Reduce ACOS: Utilize intelligent automation features that continuously optimize your campaigns to lower your Advertising Cost of Sales (ACOS).
Automated Keyword Management: Ad Badger scans your account daily and adds new negative keywords, saving you the hassle of manual management.

Protect Your Budget

The Ironclad Protector of Your Wallet: Ad Badger ensures you never waste money on ineffective keywords by hunting for and eliminating misbehaving search terms every night.
Never-Negative List: Maintain control over specific search terms with the “Never-Negative List” feature, preventing important keywords from being automatically added as negatives.

Exclsive Acess for PAS Client

Complimentary Access: Many of our clients receive Ad Badger at no additional cost, providing unparalleled access to top-tier Amazon advertising management and automation tools.

Why Choose US?
Partner with PAS to leverage the powerful capabilities of Ad Badger, streamline your Amazon PPC management, and achieve outstanding results in your advertising efforts. Join us today and experience the benefits of advanced automation and expert support!
